target.mrk: Mettre à jour un agent Windows

trans-unit.source: You can activate the automatic update mode on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents or update agents manually.<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> See the <MadCap:xref href="Update_Your_Web_Server_Address.htm">Update Your Web Server Address</MadCap:xref> section to configure the automatic update of agents in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" />.</MadCap:conditionalText> <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">See the administration guide to configure the automatic update of agents in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" />.</MadCap:conditionalText>

seg-source.mrk: You can activate the automatic update mode on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents or update agents manually.<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">

See the <MadCap:xref href="Update_Your_Web_Server_Address.htm">Update Your Web Server Address</MadCap:xref> section to configure the automatic update of agents in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" />.</MadCap:conditionalText>

<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">See the administration guide to configure the automatic update of agents in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" />.</MadCap:conditionalText>

target.mrk: Vous pouvez activer le mode de mise à jour automatique des agents <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> ou mettre à jour des agents manuellement.<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">

Consultez la section <MadCap:xref href="Update_Your_Web_Server_Address.htm">Update Your Web Server Address</MadCap:xref> pour configurer la mise à jour automatique des agents dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" />.</MadCap:conditionalText>

<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Consultez le guide d'administration pour configurer la mise à jour automatique des agents dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" />.</MadCap:conditionalText>
Pour lancer manuellement une mise à jour :

trans-unit.source: Launch the setup as described in <MadCap:xref href="Install_Windows_Agent.htm#aln_installation_adm_2087185880_1359279" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">To install a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> Windows agent</MadCap:xref>. The setup starts in update mode. Follow on-screen instructions.

seg-source.mrk: Launch the setup as described in <MadCap:xref href="Install_Windows_Agent.htm#aln_installation_adm_2087185880_1359279" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">To install a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> Windows agent</MadCap:xref>.
The setup starts in update mode.

target.mrk: Lancez l'installation comme décrit dans <MadCap:xref href="Install_Windows_Agent.htm#aln_installation_adm_2087185880_1359279" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">To install a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> Windows agent</MadCap:xref>.
La configuration démarre en mode de mise à jour.
Suivez les instructions affichées sur l'écran.
